sentence: The  water  situation  in  Gaza  was  fragile  even  before  Hamas'  Oct.  7  attack  that  killed  1,200  people,  according  to  Israel.

In  its  subsequent  air-and-ground  attack  on  Gaza,  Israel  has  killed  more  than  21,000  Palestinians,  according  to  Gaza  health  authorities,  and  knocked  out  power  to  much  of  the  Gaza  Strip.
